name: The Last Game You'll Ever Play
name_original: The Last Game You'll Ever Play
description:
Your company, Bombsoft, is showing off their biggest game ever at E3 2076, where only cyborg ghosts rule the land!

For the Giant Rom 3 competition. Really more of a proof of concept than anything.

Giant ROM v.2 Updates:
-Reduced monster health
-Improved monster AI so that they track your player's position to increase difficulty.

Future Updates:
-Will add sprites not ripped from the tutorial
-Not placeholder art
-More questions to add more modifiers
-More features that can change gameplay
